title: 103: Adam's Road to the San Jose Pro: Week 4 Update
description: Recorded on Monday, June 22nd, this is Adam's FINAL update before he takes the stage at the San Jose Pro. In this episode you will hear an Adam you have never heard before, depleted, tired but ready to give it his all this Saturday at the Santa Clara Convention Center at 5001 Great America Parkway, Santa Clara, CA. If you are in the area come out and support Adam. Doors open at 6pm. If not, tune in on the Periscope app, at mindpumpradio. Sal and Justin will be broadcasting live from there.
